content.detailedDescription:
around late august of 1980 at approximately 9 p.M. a friend of mine and i had just left my cousin's apartment and i had just pulled my car onto forest drive, the boulevard by her building, heading east, located a couple of miles from downtown columbia, s.C., when my friend directed my attention into the early evening late summer sky just after dark above as seen through the automobile's windshield. flying some hundreds of feet above our vehicle (and flying directly above and in line with the street on which we were driving) were two very luminous bright green spheres traveling in perfect unison one with the other. they flew at exactly the same height and speed throughout the sighting and never varied. these orbs were a very beautiful shade of green and appeared almost irridescent and translucent as they softly glowed in the night sky. they weren't huge but their size would be difficult to calculate, appearing somewhat akin in size to a full moon well above the horizon, since their altitude was unknown (they could have been larger than they appeared if their height was thousands of feet rather than hundreds - which they may have been). they left no trail behind them. the speed of the craft was considerably faster than the 35 or 40 mph we were cruising and so we were able to view the ufos for only about maybe 30 seconds to a minute or so. we kept them continuously in sight for the entire viewing and they stayed in perfect formation one with the other. we watched them until they disappeared over the treetops in the distance looking down the road ahead of us. it was somehow exhilarating to observe these beautiful forms which we could instantly tell were not manmade.                                                                       several years later (late 1980's in the fall) i was with the same cousin whom i had visited the night of the first sighting. we were across the congaree river in cayce, s.C., maybe five miles from the location of the first sighting and were outside my vehicle standing by the river and facing across it toward the city of columbia. we had just left the home of one of my cousin's friends and decided to take a look at the city from the riverbank. this was probably around 11-11:30 p.M. in the evening. all of a sudden a single green orb, appearing identical in size, shape and color to the first pair sighted, suddenly streaked across the night sky heading from west to east (same approximate direction that the first ufos were travelling). it appeared to be flying at about the same altitude as those spotted during the first sighting. my cousin and i observed it for maybe 20 to 30 seconds when it disappeared beyond the distant horizon of trees and buildings probably a couple miles distant on the opposite side of the river.
     amazingly enough, several years after this second sighting incident, around 1997 or 1998 during the summer months, there was yet a third incident reported by the same friend involved in the first sighting. this time we were both staying at a beach house on folly beach near charleston, s.C. it was about 3 a.M. in the morning, he said, when he left his bedroom and walked out onto the deck to take a look at the ocean. it was a clear night (as were the nights of the other two sightings). i was sound asleep in an adjacent upstairs bedroom at the time. he said that suddenly another green orb (seemingly identical to the other ones sighted previously) came into view up in the sky directly overhead (altitude unknown)and proceeded approximately from north (toward charleston) to south, following the shoreline. he watched it until it disappeared beyond the buildings toward the center of folly beach. as previously, there was no sound emitted by the craft and no trail left behind. no alcohol or drugs was being used when any of these sightings occurred and all witnesses were sober at the time of the sightings.
content.summary: A friend and i sighted two glowing irridescent green balls flying side by side above street on which we were riding.

content.detailedDescription: I was then living at my house in lakemont. we were actually moving our possesions into the moving van when i went inside to get a drink. i walked outside to my porch, and looked into the sky to see what all the comotion was about. i saw a very fast moving, shining object. then, immediately thereafter two black(i assumed military)helicopters flew across the sky. i could not get my camera, or camcorder becuase it was already packed away.I thought the object was a spaceship when i first saw it, because i believe in ufo`s and aliens. it appeared to be somehow dragging along the sky, it was going well over 75 m.P.H . i honestly was not surprised, except for the helicopters.I lost sight of he object after it flew out of sight. it was daytime. it was bigger than the helicopters. my radio went kind of staticy when it went by changes stations,dimmed,and paused,and became louder. immediately after it went by my dogs freaked out. i became very dizzy (after, but before the helicopters)and my vision blackened. i almost fell over but caught myself. my vision and dizzy symptons still occur, when i get up to fast.
content.summary: Two helicopters were chasing after a very fast blurred object..

content.detailedDescription:
At exactly 20:05 hours on the evening of december 5th, 2008, i was in my back yard walking my dogs along with family cats.  only lights on was backdoor light.  dogs were running around yard as usual.  what drew my attention to object i witnessed, was one of my cats, who would normally stays a distance from me, ran towards me and stopped right by my right leg.  she sat down and was looking up over the roof of house.  i looked at the cat, thinking she was probably just looking at plane lights or maybe a bird so something.  she kept looking, so then i looked up to see what she was seeing.

what i believed i saw at first, was a mass of bird flying over, and more than likely geese, since the formation was sort of looked liked a shape of geese migrating.  but then reality hit me.  it was moving at approximately 10 to 20 mph, almost parallel to my street, but when i focused on it, i then could see, that it had mass, and structure of a wedge shape.  it was close enough that i could get a base size from comparing it to the roof of my home.  the overall length was approximately 100 to 150 feet long, and height was approximately 7 to 10 feet, and it was only 100 to 200 feet from the ground.  i was looking at the right lower quarter, from bow to stern.  there weren���t any lights or any sound what-so-ever emitting from the craft. the right side was visible because of the lights of homes and a few street lights carried the that height.  i also had a small private aircraft flying at one to two thousand feet at about 2 miles southwest of our location, so i could get some variable and we have high pecan trees which also gave me some comparison to height from the ground.

what was apparent, the side wasn���t a smooth surface.  i say this because you could see dark and then somewhat lighter shades.  this to me could have been either two assumptions:  1.  the surface was painted, as we do some of our military aircraft, so it will blend in with the sky (clouds lighter and darker) or 2.  the surface had angles on it which would show lighter for the parts protruding out and dark for the area that was indented. this is similar to our stealth aircraft for displacing radar.  the light of homes and street lights were barely hitting the surface of the object but it was enough to make out the details.
content.summary: Wedge shaped object flew over home at 20:05hrs, dec 5,  2008 at approx 150 ft.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello mufon, the richardsville and summerduck virginia area is a current hotspot flap of ufo activity over the past several months.  i go out and view the stuff several nights every week.  i have seen a luminace mothership, the length of a football field with red lights down it's side that emits its own white light from its skin.  there is a red and blue ufo that repeatedly follows the same flight pattern down the rapihannock and rapidan rivers over and over through the night; and dozens of what i call 10 - 15 feet long dragfly ufo crafts that have search beams and fly directly over the woods or open fields.  i have seen two of them fairly close.  one almost flew directly above me while traveling about 50 feet above the ground.  they know my truck and one of them even followed me home one night.  the dragonfly crafts show up in numbers every night.  the dragonfly craft turn on and off a yellowish/white search beam while traveling through the woods and fields of the area.  another night, one was about to fly directly over me and saw me and shut off its light beam and disappeared completely from view.  i have seen them just sit motionless in the sky.  i have seen the dragonfly crafts send beams of blue light from one to another while still in the sky ...A possible means of recharging their electrical systems?  all of the above crafts are silent.  i was out in my truck from 7pm to 11pm last night and 4 airplanes flew over the sky during that time and they had conventional flashing lights and made the normal airplane sound.  these other crafts are silent do not make sounds like helicopters and airplanes do and their flashing lights are much different as well.

sincerely, dave
content.summary: Several types of ufo's seen over richardsville and summerduck, virginia nightly.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on an annual trip to new york with university, me and a friend decided to walk from the meat packing district, into the financial district to shoot some images, we saw a man feeding birds and began to shoot as many images as we could without ever really checking the view finder. 

i got back and scanned my images, i was amazed to find this image with an unusual disc like shape in the top left corner. i developed the film and scanned it whilst i was in america and owned a 40mb tiff file, but, when we went through customs at jfk i got stopped because of the amount of expensive photography equipment in my bag, they thought i bought most of it in ny. they asked too look at my external hard drive and i gave them permission. they came back to me about an hour later and seized all of my equipment, telling me my images were 'suspicious' 

a few days later and i get a letter telling me my photographic equipment is on its way home but none of my work from the trip is.

the image i did manage to get was taken using a friends phone, i obviously had to bring it into photoshop in an attempt to bring out as much detail as i could, to do this i had to turn the image black and white to bump the contrast and sharpen the detail.

i hope you can help me out with this one, i've been though a lot just to get this image on here.
content.summary: I was photographing a man feeding birds, i didnt notice the object at the time.

content.detailedDescription: Streaked across sky very fast, thought it was a shooting star until it stopped, stayed still, then changed direction back to where it came from at the same fast pace. saw this while standing on my balcony from star city casino, sydney.
content.summary: Streaked across sky very fast, thought it was a shooting star until it stopped, stayed still, then changed direction back to where it came from at the same fast pace. saw this while standing on my balcony from star city casino, sydney.

content.detailedDescription: I was getting things ready in my car to begin my shift of work, when i noticed some unusual bright lights in the sky to my east. i watched them for about 20 minutes until they suddenly went straight up at an extremely high rate of speed and disappeared. the lights remained in an almost level plane until they were gone from view. i have lived in this location for 4 years and i am very familiar with the surrounding terrain and i have never seen these lights before. the light consisted of two very bright, one on either end, a somewhat dimmer one in the middle and a very dim one on the northern end of the string. i could make out no definite shape, nor could i hear any sounds. i have seen aircraft on numerous occasions fly across this ridge, but never like this. if this was a solid object it would have been very large, at least two hundred yards from north to south. i did obtain video for a few minutes until the battery quit on my recorder.
content.summary: 3 bright lights, 1 dimmer on northern edge, strung out horizontal to a ridge line.

content.detailedDescription:
12/5/08 approximately 7:05pm eastern time: my family was leaving for a night out when we noticed 3 very bright white lights in the near distance outside our front door of our home. i took some pictures (enclosed) with a digital camera but the zoom didn't do a very good job so the pictures look farther away then we actually seen with our naked eyes.  we stood there and watched in amazement and wonder what exactly they were.  all three object were hovering in a fixed spot and then one object would glide what seemed to be in a slow motion toward one of the others and stop and then distanced itself further and had colorful blinking lights and what sounded like a quite (helicopter propeller) like sound, but quieter.  because of the time and our prior commitment, we had to leave but we had plenty to talk about and thought maybe it was military related since a naval air base is located 10 to 15 miles south in horsham, pa. 

12/5/08 approximately 9:45pm eastern time:  my family was returning home and seen just one object with the same exact description (bright white lights) and what looked to be a circular shape but was hard to make out because the lights were so bright and very close to the objects underbelly (which made the object look blurred to the naked eye) even my family members said they couldn't make it out for the same reasons, the bright lights were just so bright which made it look blurry.  it was flying close to the ground over farm fields off of stump & haring roads in plumstead and after trying to follow it for a minute or two with our vehicle, it was gone into the crystal clear, star-lit sky.

pretty cool.... whatever it was....
content.summary: 3 objects with very bright white lights hovering for approximately 5 minutes (7:05 pm eastern time) in the near distance. again approximately (9:45pm easter time) 1 object with bright white lights flying over a farm field not far from original sighting.

content.detailedDescription: About 5:40pm i arrived at santa monica college for a class. upon arrival i had looked to the west to admire jupiter and venus shining brightly in the sky. i'm an astronomy enthusiast and i had heard a couple days ago that the moon and the two planets were close together and i was looking at how far the moon had travled away from the two planets. i was in line waiting to get into a lab class when about 6:20pm i looked at the moon again and two lights caught my eye that i hadn't noticed before. they were lined up vertically to the east of the moon, about 1-1/2 hand widths or so, directly over a building on the campus called the hss building. at first i thought i was looking at sirius or vega but the two lights (the vertically higher one was slightly brighter) were colored more like incandescent car headlights with a slightly yellow hue to them. if you can imagine a car headlight off in the distance and how you can see the source but not the beam of light, then you know what it looked like. except they were high in the sky, east of the moon and not moving at all.  i turned my head for a second to adjust my glasses and looked up again and the lower of hte two lights was gone.  the higher one was there for another second then slowly dimmed out of sight. at first i thought i went behind a really dark dense cloud but i couldnt find any clouds.  i kept watching the same spot and a few seconds later a high flying airplace (with blinking blue and red lights) passed by the area very close to where i saw the two motionless lights and it never disappeared so i knew a cloud was not what caused the light to dim out of sight.  the lights didn't move and were very clear. there was no shape to them. just pin points like stars. living in a large city you dont see very many stars. you see planets from time to time and some of the brightest stars but these two light looked too large and had the wrong color hue. just to be sure when i got home later i checked an astronomy program i have on my computer to see if maybe there was a really bright constellation in the area at that time and there was nothing that bright. they were as bright as venus, made no sound or movement. just on then off. i thought maybe it ould be a helicopter but there was no noise and even helicopters have blinking marker lights. i kept looking in the area to see if they would come back, but after 10 minutes i gave up
content.summary: 2 lights almost about 75 degrees up,  and east of the moon appeared and suddenly disappeared

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were taking a walk around the neighborhood at around 9 pm friday night, dec 5, 2008.  we were standing at the corner of ely and imnaha avenues in kennewick, washington, when we saw two lighted objects in sky directly overhead, perhaps 1000 feet altitude; rather saw 2 objects of which only a bright white light on each was distinctly visible and possibly a blinking red light that was obscured by the brighter white light on each.  i estimate 1000 feet altitude because of the appearance of the 'headlamps' seemed like aircraft on a landing pattern, or as close as an aircraft approaching a runway.  the two lights moved slowly and uniformly, seemed to be together as if they were fore and aft lights of a blimp, but then their relative positions changed such as to suggest two separate objects.  silent running:  no sound detected whatsover during the transit of the objects.  objects flew from west to east, turned south, one object halted and remained stationary while the other continued south very slowly.  the southerly object suddenly appeared to break apart into smaller separate and weaker lights which quickly dimmed and extinguished.  the remaining object began to move northerly. at that time, another passerby encountered us, and we discussed what we'd each been seeing.  then, the remaining object also broke apart similarly to the first object, and after several seconds a distinctly loud report was heard both by myself, my wife and the passerby.  i looked at my cell phone a couple times during this event to gage the time:  we had been watching the lights for several minutes when i first checked the time (at 8:55 pm), and after the loud explosion at about 9:05 pm.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw two lights move across local sky; apparently disintegrate; one loud explosion heard.

content.detailedDescription: I was smoking a ciggarette on a break at work. i sit on a chair facing south. my workplace is located in between bowles and belleview on s. federal. i see a slight glow in the clouds in the distance( over 10 miles away) i thought at first it was a spotlight that businesses use in grand openings. after the circular glow grew closer at the speed it was moving i ruled out the spotlight theory.. it flew directly over me at medium paced speed.. i watched it until it was out of my view due to the building directly behind me. the whole thing happened in about 15 secs. i wasnt scared, just kinda shocked. it was really cloudy so i dont think plane lights would even show through. this object was low and in the clouds.. the glow was coming from within clouds which were at a fairly low alttitude so i could get a good estimate of how large it was.. it was big.. whatever it was i know it wasnt a plane or a helicopter.. i just wish i had a camera.. cause for how short it seemed ive never seen anything like that.. i stayed out for a few more min. just to double check to see if it might have been a spotlight.. i just want to see if anyone else saw this crazy object
content.summary: Large glowing circular shape.. low altittude very high speed.

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving somererset,tx on benton city rd. heading towards loop 1604.  i noticed  two very bright  red lights  one on the right and one on the left, low in the sky up ahead.  at this point i had no idea what it was.. i knew it was not a plane or any helicopter.  i continued up to the stop sign and stayed there for about 3 or 4 minutes.  just watching this light.  it did not move at all.  it was proably around 800 feet up and about 1500- 2000 feet away from me.  i decided to head towards san antonio.  i took a left onto loop 1604 heading north.  i drove very slowly.  i was heading more towards the object at this time so i could get a closer look. i started to see this was very well an aircraft of some type.   as i was driving around to the left of it.. i noticed there were two other lights.  they were both white lights on each side, not as bright.  it looks like it was either a diamond shaped aircraft.. or a circular aircraft.  two red lights opposite each other and two white lights opposite each other.  
i pulled off the side of the road and got out of the car.  i was much closer probably about 900 feet away, and it was still at the same height.  i could make out a tubular frame / steel colored and outlines of a door/ or hatch?  not sure what the out line was.. but could see detail on the body of the aircraft from the illuminating lights on all ends...  there where no other lights coming from the craft.  it had no sound coming from it at all.  at this time i knew this was some kind of ufo.  i started walking towards the field in it's direction.  that is when it moved slowly away for about 4 more seconds and then quickly took off at the same height in the direction of loop 1604 south. the white lights then were off and only the red lights were still on.   this thing was so fast i watched it take off in the horizon and it was completely gone from my sight in less then 10 seconds.  as i said before.. there was no noise at all coming from this ufo and it stayed at the same altitude as it left.  i am wondering if anyone else out there saw this????  i only wish that i had my camcorder with me.....
content.summary: Sighting of ufo in somerset, texas.

content.detailedDescription: my girlfriend and i were coming home from the store when we saw a red/orange like light in the sky. we had turned off 231 onto 70 between newtonville and chrisney when we spotted it, we decided to follow it and see what it was. as we drew closer to the light we noticed that it was not moving. we drove about two miles and it was right overhead in a clear starry sky.Then as we watched it we noticed another one that looked like a real bright star. then the one above us just faded out.So we pulled over on a side road to watch the other one.We sat still watching it for about a minute and watched as it too faded out. we sat for a couple more minutes to see if they would reapear then we went home.About two weeks before that one came over my house about two miles west of this location. it was moving south, stopped for a few seconds and then it went east. and faded out.About a year and a half my son and i had been seeing these kind of lights aproximitly three miles west of these locations. all i can really say about what i felt like at the time is i was excited to see it for i have seen these lights several times and i always make it a point to look for them when i am out in the yard or out driving around. my son and i always ask each other if we have seen anymore of the lights when we see ot talk to each other. i was glad my girlfriend was with me so that i had a witness that i had seen them. my son and i had been telling her about them.
content.summary: They looked like stars only red orande color. there were two. neither moved in any way. as we came closer to them they seemed to almost fade away then just vanished. this is not the only time we have seen them.

content.detailedDescription: My family went to medford because my husband had an appointment at the employment department and we were going to pick up a few groceries when he was done. we had just had a sighting earlier in the day so i brought my video camera along this time. we were parked on oakdale, the cross street was w. 6th, we were playing a memory story game and watching the sky to see if we could see anything. about 20 minutes of waiting my youngest daughter spotted 2 bright spheres to the north of us. they were about 25-30 degrees up in the sky. i tried to get a photo of them and was not able to find them with the camera, so i grabbed the video camera and sighted in one of them, it was moving to the north and getting smaller, staying about the same spot just getting smaller. i went to sight in the other one and couldn't find it where it was first sighted as it had moved to the west south west. there were two people that stopped to see what we were looking at and getting video of so i showed them, one just came out of the employment department and was getting into his vehicle and came over and the other was walking past us and he stopped to look. most people just kept driving by as they were trying to see what we were looking at. the second object moved to the west and then started moving to the south. i did not have my tripod with me so the video is really shaky, so i tried to keep from zooming in all the way to help with the shake. we left before the second object was out of sight, i tried to locate it as we were driving away and could not find it.
content.summary: 2 bright spheres over medford, oregon.

content.detailedDescription: Was driving on 413 towards 95 highway on 05 december 2008 around 8:15am. i was a passenger in the vehicle and never took attention off object. noticed large object, round shape off in the distance.  object was shiny, metalic, and still. drove around bend behind trees and object was gone.  skys were clear at the time.
content.summary: Silver metalic round object. big. hovering still. disappeared suddenly.

content.detailedDescription: My husband & i were at a job contact, waiting to speak with the owner of the business and were scanning the sky talking with one of the employees. the fog had started to clear and there was blue sky showing. i spotted two bright white spheres near each other to the north of our location and showed my husband where they were and the employee, he looked briefly but was not interested and left. the objects were about 35-45 degrees up in the sky to the north, just above the top of a tree. they were slowly moving to the west. about 2-3 minutes later i spotted a third one also moving to the west. they moved west for a little while then started moving south past the trees where we could not see them any longer. as they were moving south we were facing west and they appeared to be about 45-55 degrees up in the sky. the closest cross roads were villas and tablerock.
content.summary: 3 bright white spheres near medford - rogue valley international airport

content.detailedDescription: Alerted to sky at @ 4:50 pm on 12/5/08 by jet enjine sound while walking pet.  jet was identified as military with naked eye,but flying very high in north direction. "bright star" was then noticed in north direction.  i continued to watch object for 5-7 minutes with reference to the trees, and object was slowly "drifting toward the west.  i took my pet inside and grabbed my binoculars to get a better view, but when i returned outside the object was gone.  i went to several different vantage points and scanned the sky, but could not locate it again.  it was at least as bright as venus is currently in the eastern sky.  definitely not venus or jupiter, and i'd bet that the jet was scrambled specifically to get a better view!
content.summary: Bright star where it should not have been, and drifting slowly.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking on the beach and saw this green ball over the ocean it shot straight up in the sky leaving a streek of green behind it..It looked like it went into space cause i saw a thing that looked like a star or plane flying at a high rate of speed and then disapeered south east of my location. this is very strange and is similar to another sighting i had a few weeks back
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Green disc over ocean.

content.detailedDescription: A large green glowing object came out of the atlantic ocean approx 5 miles out from coast..Was walking on the beach just after dark and saw this abject at first i thought it was just a boat light..It then moved up into the sky shifted left quickly and then shot straight up and out of sight all while leaving a streak of light or a tail that glowed for about 30 seconds after the object disappeared..As i kept looking up i noticed what looked like a star moving across the sky then this object streaked to the right at a high rate of speed and disappeared..This is the first time ive ever seen anything like this..And ive always been a sceptic..When i came home and told my husband which is a deputy he said yeah what ever and blew me off..I'm not sure what i saw but maybe you can shed some light on it for me ..Thanks
content.summary: Round object comes out of ocean.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were tent camping in my backyard. we noticed a solid white light moving from north to south. at first we thought it was a high flying airplane but thought it strange that it had no visible position lights and there was no sound. we watched the object for approximately thirty seconds as it smoothly tracked across the sky, then it abruptly stopped. it stayed motionless for about five seconds then reversed itself at tremendous speed,covering about one quarter of its previous distance in about one second. it abruptly stopped again, remaining motionless for about three seconds. it then accelerated back to its original position in no more than a second and stopped. after approximately two seconds it exploded in a bright flash. pieces of flaming debris could be seen radiating outward from the explosion. there was absolutely no sound associated with the incident. my estimate of the time and date is easily a year off of the exact date. i could have been between 12 and 14 years old. i'm thinking i was probably around 13. i don't recall telling anyone of the incident. in later life i became a private pilot. as i reflect back on the incident and apply my knowledge of aviation, i realize that there was no way to judge the altitude or speed of the object. i do estimate however that the object was several miles high as evidenced by the lack of any sound during the explosion. applying my limited knowledge to the incident today i can imagine that the object could have traveled at thousands of miles per hour when it made its abrupt maneuvers.
content.summary: Bright light moved across sky, stopped, reversed quickly, accelerated back to original position, then exploded.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the bus on the way home from university at approximatly 4pm, passing through bootle. i was looking out the window when something caught my eye. i looked up and saw what appeared to be a dark disc shaped object in the sky.  a few seconds later another 3 objects appeared, the same as the first. they were all moving in different directions and then stopped and hovered. they appeared to be black on the base. 
the objects appeared to be spinning. i lost sight of them as the bus i was on continued along its journey. 
the experience was quite mesmorising, and i only wish i would have been able to recordv the event.
content.summary: 4 spinning disc shape objects.

content.detailedDescription:
I heard the sheriff's airplane overhead, and went out to see what they were flying around.  they were circling catalina, arizona in a wide clockwise pattern, and had just passed my place heading west, then to the north when i spotted a large object to the west high in the clear sky, at roughly a 30-degree angle from me.  it was moving northward fast, silently, and at a constant speed, having the behavior of an orbiting satellite, in this case it would have been a polar orbit.

at first i concurred it was a satellite, then realized i should be seeing a dot of light moving through space, and not a large, dark brown colored object.  i concurred that if it was in earth orbit this time of night, it had to be huge to be reflecting sunlight.  if it was not in orbit, it was creating its own light(ing) in the night sky.  i rushed inside to get my nikon d-80 camera, which already had the nikkor 70 to 300mm vr zoom (vibration reduction) lens on it, removed the lens cover, and double checked to make sure the camera was on its most sensitive setting (when in the most sensitive setting, it can see infrared too).

returning outside, the object was now far north-northwest of here, and the sheriff's airplane was now heading in that direction too (speculating, perhaps they observed it too, and were giving chase).  i took three free-handed pictures, two of which i'm sending to you.  the lights are clearly not of an airplane, aircraft and law enforcement aircraft marker lights are different.  also i was only able to see the lights from it, i could no longer see the actual vehicle, as i did before.

in each picture you will see to the bottom right of the brightest light group, other lights too that i didn't notice until i had these images on my computer screen.  one a gray-red-brown, the other different shades of blue with white.  also note their angle change between the two pictures.  even though i had vibration reduction enabled on my lens, please allow for camera shake, due to the shutter being open about a second.  my camera was set up to where it would not take a picture unless it was focused on something.

after a friend with a doctorate in physics looked at the emailed pictures, he was convinced i took pictures of a triangular shaped type of ufo that's been spotted around the world lately.  what i initially saw was not triangular shaped, but appeared boxy, like a small collection of large, interconnected boxes.  they were too far away to see exact details though, but obviously much further away than the sheriff's airplane.

i don't know what to tell you, other than what i observed.
content.summary: Spotted brownish, multi-interconnected boxy shaped vehicle(s) in the night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
at approx. 9:20pm i was heading out of doors from my residence to the basha's store to buy groceries when these odd lights attracted my attention. they were over the superstition wilderness area, approx. 1 - 1.5 miles south east of the kings ranch rd. and alameda intersection, south-east of superstition mntn. these lights were seen approx. 1/2 mile in altitude. they would flash on for about 3 seconds in duration very bright and somewhat large like a landing light from a commercial aircraft, very pinkish-orange in color, maybe even like a flare. not a directed beam but an orb in shape. in succession there was one, then another, then another about 1 second apart from one another and about 100 feet apart, up to 4 or 5 at a time. as the third or fourth one would illuminate the first would turn off, then the next and so on, in a line formation from my point of view. no sound of a jet was heard from my vacinity in the neighborhood. only distant traffic and barking dogs, no planes or helicopters were heard by me, as well as the sound of fireworks not evident. no other flashing or steady aircraft marker lights were observed. i observed this for about for about 20 minutes in the area then it just stopped. it might have been occurring longer but i was indoors and only noticed it when i came outside at 9:20pm. the color and intensity of the light is what caught my attention. 
 i have witnessed these same colored lights previously traversing up and down the south side of superstition mntn in the past, an event lasting for at least 45 minutes one night in winter/spring of 2007 and very odd, though a singular light, not mulitple. i witnessed this particular event with an avid, somewhat gabby self proclaimed ufo reporter by the name of taylor, drives a forest green jeep cherokee last name unknown, from the a.J. laundromat parking lot. this also occured at approx the same time as this observation referred above.
content.summary: Orange/pink lights flashing on then off in succession in lines.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from a friends house heading east at 12:35am. it was very cold out and the sky was 100% clear. i was traveling threw hinsdale when i looked out the driver side window of my car and saw a bright light in the sky hovering over the houses at 12:40am. after a glance i looked again and saw that it was cigar shaped glowing white. there were 3-4 small blue lights on it and one big blue light at the bottom end of it that was pulsing. it hovered for a few seconds then drifted in my direction, but then made a slow turn to the north east. after another moment it raced off to the horizon, at which point it stopped. the road dipped down in elevation after a bridge and i lost sight of the object behind the tree line. after the racing off part it looked like a faint star in the sky. i was almost instantly hit with a huge adrenaline rush when i realized what was hovering over the houses. i felt a little scared for a moment, very very shocked. never thought i would ever see anything like this.
content.summary: Saw a cigar shaped object glowing blue white out in the sky, then race off out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: My wife went out to the back yard to have a cig. and seen three trinkling lights s.E. in a triangle formation when they started to get close enough to see that they were 3 triangle shaped objects one of the lights started to shoot straight up. at that time she came in the house to wake me up. when i got to the back yard i saw a triangle shaped object fly over our house heading n.W. 3 lights with a big strobe in the center. we live fairly close to the portland, or. airport and see aircraft fly over all the time and you can hear them. the one that went over the house heading n.W. made no sound what so ever. the other one headed n.E. and was to far away to make out its shape. and i could still see the one that shot straight up in the s.E. but was to far away to make out its shape. my wife said that they were all shaped like the one that went over the house heading n.W. its just wierd that they didn't make any noise. sorry that i didn't take a picture of it.
content.summary: 3 triangle shaped objects went off in different directions.

content.detailedDescription: On november 26 maybe a fine chance the 25th, i was driving by car traveling north to south from plainnview ny to wantagh,ny on the seaford oyster bay expressway, i noticed a cluster(10?) of starlike objects and a little plane moving toward this cluster - it had a blinking red light, in the upper right hand corner of sky which i thought were airplanes and due to heavy thanksgiving traffic but immediately noticed at least three vertical white line toward the center lower to lower right of my view.  these straight lines were not illuminated, solid, white,and stationary which looked like white curtain pull wands.   i never saw solid (not blurred like jet lines) in the sky before this. i haven't a clue what this could have been.  i was amazed but then lost sight a about 5 minutes earlier because i had to get off at exit 105.  there was moderate traffic which i then tried to keep my eyes on the road and  had no thought of reporting this, only to my boyfriend later that night, or getting out and taking a picture with my camera on my cell phone.
content.summary: Saw cluster of star-like objects (planes) over 3 distinct lines in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 10:30 pm (2230 hours) local time on thursday, 4 december the two of us were outside in the backyard smoking cigarettes and sky watching.  it was a clear night with moderate cloud cover, no fog, no visible stars or planets or the moon.  we observed a massive series of twinkling lights in the sky displaying non-ballistic movement.  estimated 30,000 feet, constant, stationery, east by southeast for approximately 5 minutes.   

the light became much brighter with additional colors around the center.  the lights started pulsing in and out and grew gradually dimmer then faded to nothing.  the lights on the object pulsed twice.  at that time a northbound commercial airliner passed approximately 5,00 feet below the object but the object disappeared (the lights pulsed and faded out) before the airliner crossed into its line of sight.  the male felt a heavy hum with numbness in his chest.  we both felt electric; as if a thick static charge had permeated our bodies.  we then went into the house.

we have 3 cats and one dog.  the youngest female cat (age 2 ���) was very alert and agitated.  one of the male cats was unusually bugged eyed.  the other male cat and dog slept through the entire events.  at approximately 10:50 pm the whole house seemed as if it was buzzing and we sensed a presence and felt something was in the house.  we continued to feel the static charge on our bodies.  we noticed small disturbances within our one story house.  lamps were moved, lights turned on and items on flat surfaces were slightly moved by unseen forces.  at the same time we experienced a ���brown out��� in the bedroom.  power dimmed but did not fail.  also in our bedroom we felt a difference in temperature where the heat had been on at 70 degrees; it was now approximately 40 degrees and the thermostat still set to 70 degrees.  the female cat continued to be agitated and followed us as we walked through the house.  

at approximately 11:15 pm we sat on the couch in the living room trying to comprehend what we had seen and experienced. at that time we both heard a loud whooshing, rumbling, sound; like we were next to a freight train or in a wind tunnel.  this rushing noise lasted about 7or 8 seconds.  the female saw numerous sparkly crystal shapes in the backyard and felt drawn to them yet scared of them at the same time.  the female mentioned that for the last 25-30 minutes she felt if a nail file had been driven into the top of her right foot and that the sole of her foot was hot and heavy with static electricity.  when the female removed the sock on her right foot you could see 3 small triangular puncture marks.  an hour later at 12:15 am when the female again took of her sock there was what appeared to be a 1 inch long laser burn by her big toe.  when we tried to take numerous digital photos of the female���s injury the camera would not focus on the areas in question.  the female cat still continued to be agitated and wanted to be held and petted by each of us.  

at 12 midnight, now friday, 5 december we began preparations to go to sleep.  we woke up our dog to let him outside to the backyard for ���his business���.  we really had to rouse him; he would not wake up which is unusual.  when we finally woke him up our dog would not go outside to the backyard where we saw the object/event.  our dog always and only goes out the back door for ���his business���.  our dog balked at the back door and was not going outside.  only with guidance, perseverance and escorted by both of us he went out and did ���his business��� in record time without any sniffing.  after our dog finished he quickly ran inside the house and crawled back in his bed.   

at 1215 am, we began to get undressed to shower and go to bed.  when the male took of his t-shirt we noticed a massive, non-allergenic, non-linear, eruptive rash.  the rash was similar to sunburn or gamma exposure.  we have exceptional digital photos of the rash/burns.  the rash/burns feel fine to the male and he is not in pain but the damaged skin is warm to the touch.  it appears that he spent a good part of the day out in the desert.  

it is now 2:00 am and it feels as if the house is full of ghosts.  we can sense that a presence was in our home, in the adjoining garage and in the backyard.  the animals have finally relaxed and gone to bed but we are still quite keyed up and unable to go to sleep.  

we would like to talk to someone at mufon about our experience but don���t know what to do.  this is not the first time either of us have seen objects in the sky but we this is first full on contact experience that we have ever, ever had.  we don���t want publicity we just want guidance and help to point us in the right direrction to help us cope with this experience.   

two freakin��� traumatized people in sequim, washington
content.summary: Many different colored lights centered around a pulsing amber hub.

content.detailedDescription:
I was using a digital camera w/video feature to try to capture some of the beauty of the drive south on highway 101 through the big sur area.  the sun was sparkling on the water, then trees and a speed limit sign obscured the view and i stopped recording.  i did not see the object at the time, nor did my husband.

months later, while reviewing the footage using quicktime, i noticed something odd.  advancing 'frame' by 'frame', i saw a cylindrical object appear & disappear.  i thought it was odd, and tried to move my finger as slowly as possible to see where/when the object came into the frame & where/when it exits.  i don't have quicktime pro, so i can't edit the footage (terribly sorry).  i tried to use imovie, to edit the footage but it advances past that frame.  so, the best description i can provide is this weird cylindrical object appears & disappears.  it's at approximately 21 seconds into the footage.

my curiosity aroused, i found your site.  i'm sure you have more sophisticated ways of analyzing the footage than me.  i am including a 'grabbed' screenshot that shows the object.
content.summary: Object appears and disappears in less than a second, was not visible to naked eye.

content.detailedDescription: We were in kew garden, queens ny at around 5:30ish at a stop light when my boyfriend told me to look up and mind you i was on the phone so i stop talking and i said wait i'm looking at something.  i could not believe my eyes because these two object were right next to each other floating. so, my thought automatically realized that it was not a plane nor a helicopter because it would of continue moving forward and if it would been a plane they have distance between each other. these two object were just floating in the sky side by side or almost kinda like facing each other blinking there lights.  like when you are in your car and you want to signal someone with your headlights. it went on and off. first one object signal with it's light and it was only one light very bright almost like a star but bright and the other object flash it's light back like if they were talking to each other. i just could not believe my eyes because the object were steady floating and just blinking their lights back and forth like about 4 times and all of sudden one disappeared. i was just stunned by it and speechless...But i still continue my conversation but said nothing. my boyfriend and i just looked at each other.  the other object just stayed there floating without blinking it's light. when the light turned green and we started moving the other object disappeared too. i hope you can understand my description.
content.summary: Two flying object side by side with one blinking light each.

content.detailedDescription: On the way to work one morning in nov, traveling along hwy 121 between napa and sonoma i saw something strange....I've seen lots of shooting stars before, this was no shooting star.  bright green, not decending to the ground, but across the horizon. the speed was not that of a shooting star either, slower...Then gone...Only posting this because someone else reported seeing something like this......
content.summary: Large bright green oval shaped object, shooting across the sky, no tail.
